QuestData.Title: Batteries Not Included
QuestData.Description:
You will not be sorry that you rescued my dear sister and me, $p.
We are the vanguard of a new technological revolution, creating opportunities for all to enhance their lives with incredible technology!
But, before we can do that, we need our laboratory to be fully powered. Those ruffians from Mechagon really did a number on our equipment.
Fully charged energy cells are exceptionally rare around here, but I can make do with broken ones.
Check around town, in the wreckage from the last attack.
